comments.en:
600x300 DPI printing mode and photo cartridge not supported. Use 300x300 DPI. A previous entry said this printer doesn't work at all: "will not print at all, sends all print jobs to spool and I can not then print from the spool" - maybe some older ghostscript versions don't work, or maybe it was just a misconfiguration.

Consumables/Refills: dual cartridge
